articles.content: Smokers are lighting up more, helping cigarette sales in the country surpass pre-Covid levels for the first time in the quarter ended March amid improved consumer mobility, reopening of offices, and … [+2671 chars]

articles.title: 2022 Mercedes-Benz C-Class India Launch Date Announced; Bookings Open - carandbike
articles.description: The new Mercedes-Benz C-Class will be launched in India on May 10. The company has also opened bookings for the car, exclusively for Mercedes-Benz owners, which is valid until April 30. Others will be able to book the car from May 1 onwards.
articles.content: The new-gen Mercedes-Benz C-Class sedan will be launched in India on May 10, 2022. The new C-Class made its global debut last year, in February 2021, and the car borrows several of its cues from the … [+3368 chars]
